meetup.title: September Meetup
meetup.description:
The co-hosts will be leading the charge this month with some exciting new content...

Bryan Robinson will discuss modern CSS with the spanking new CSS Grid Layout.

Eric Terpstra will dish out the latest and greatest in the Meteor framework, and why it can be great for your next project.

As always, food and drink and friendly faces will be provided.

Web Workers is graciously hosted by the FedEx Institute of Technology. Here's a link to a Google Map.

Room: FIT 225 (2nd floor)

Parking: The Deloach Parking Garage is $3/hr, and is right across the street from the FedEx Institute of Technology (FIT). You can also buy a 1-day pass for general parking for $2 -- see visitor parking for more details.
